content:
As an AI language model, I do not have personal opinions or beliefs, but I can provide information. 

After the move to Tennessee and renaming the team as the Tennessee Titans, the franchise had an impressive run of success at the turn of the century, including reaching the Super Bowl in 1999 and winning the AFC Championship twice in 2000 and 2020. Since then, the team has experienced both highs and lows, with some seasons ending in playoff contention and others not.

In recent years, the Titans have been competitive in the AFC South division, with quarterback Ryan Tannehill and running back Derrick Henry leading a potent offense. The team made the playoffs in 2019 and 2020, but were unable to advance past the divisional round. Looking ahead, the Titans will likely continue to be a factor in the division and conference, and their current success should give fans reason to be optimistic about the future.
